de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Interface ImConnectionContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcConnectionContext, ImvConnectionContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImConnectionContext, DefaultImcConnectionContext, DefaultImvConnectionContext

    interface ImConnectionContext
extends de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed
    Generic connection context base. The context provides common attributes and function for all connections of a session. It enables the connection to interact with the related session.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessage(TnccsMessage message)
      Adds a message received by the connection to the context for transmission to a the peer.
      List<TnccsMessage> clearMessage()
      Returns all messages, which were added to the context and clears the context message buffer.
      void invalidate()
      Disables a context and its functions.
      boolean isValid()
      Checks if context is enabled and functions are usable.
      void requestHandshakeRetry(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.enums.ImHandshakeRetryReasonEnum reason)
      Requests a handshake retry at the session.
      void validate()
      Enables a context and its functions.

      • Methods inherited from interface de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed

        getAttribute, setAttribute

      • addMessage

        void addMessage(TnccsMessage message)
                throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Adds a message received by the connection to the context for transmission to a the peer.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if message cannot be added to the context

      • clearMessage

        List<TnccsMessage> clearMessage()
        Returns all messages, which were added to the context and clears the context message buffer.
        Returns:
        a list of messages

        Requests a handshake retry at the session.
        Parameters:
        reason - the retry reason
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if handshake retry fails

      • validate

        void validate()
        Enables a context and its functions.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Disables a context and its functions.

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Checks if context is enabled and functions are usable.
        Returns:
        true if context is enabled (valid)
